description: Number of rooted identity trees with 2-colored nodes.
comments: Shifts left and halves under Weigh transform.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
maple: b:= proc(n, i) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, `if`(i<1, 0,      add(binomial(a(i), j)*b(n-i*j, i-1), j=0..n/i)))    end:a:= n-> `if`(n=1, 2, 2*b((n-1)$2)):seq(a(n), n=1..40); # _Alois P. Heinz_, May 20 2013
mathematica: b[n_, i_] := b[n, i] = If[n==0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[Binomial[a[i], j]*b[n - i*j, i-1], {j, 0, n/i}]]];a[n_] := If[n==1, 2, 2*b[n-1, n-1]];Table[a[n], {n, 1, 40}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Mar 01 2016, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
